Plot: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.
Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Writer: Brett Halliday (novel), Shane Black (screen story), Shane Black (screenplay)
Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Val Kilmer, Michelle Monaghan, Corbin Bernsen
tomatoConsensus: Tongue-in-cheek satire blends well with entertaining action and spot-on performances in this dark, eclectic neo-noir homage.
